parameter.name: timeUpdateInterval
parameter.label: Time Update Interval
parameter.description: The interval (in minutes) at which the realtime clock, date and daylight savings status of the modules will be updated, default 360. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: reconnectionInterval
parameter.label: Reconnection Interval
parameter.description: The interval (in seconds) at which reconnections should be reattempted in case of a communication problem, default 15. If set to 0 or left empty, no reconnections will be attempted.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: IP Address or Hostname
parameter.description: IP Address or hostname of Velbus server

parameter.name: port
parameter.label: Port
parameter.description: Network port to communicate with Velbus server

parameter.name: timeUpdateInterval
parameter.label: Time Update Interval
parameter.description: The interval (in minutes) at which the realtime clock, date and daylight savings status of the modules will be updated, default 360. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: reconnectionInterval
parameter.label: Reconnection Interval
parameter.description: The interval (in seconds) at which reconnections should be reattempted in case of a communication problem, default 15. If set to 0 or left empty, no reconnections will be attempted.

parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The velbus address of the device

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for the temperature sensor (in seconds), default 300. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: subaddress1
parameter.label: Channel CH9 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by Sensor or Thermostat.

parameter.name: CH9
parameter.label: CH9 Name
parameter.description: The name of CH9 (temperature sensor channel).

parameter.name: address

parameter.description: The velbus address of the device

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for the sensors (in seconds), default 300. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The velbus address of the device

parameter.name: subaddress1
parameter.label: Channel CH9..CH16 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 1 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by Page 3-4 or Pushbuttons 9-16.

parameter.name: subaddress2
parameter.label: Channel CH17..CH24 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 2 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by Page 5-6 or Pushbuttons 17-24.

parameter.name: subaddress3
parameter.label: Channel CH25..CH32 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 3 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by Page 7-8 or Pushbuttons 25-32.

parameter.name: subaddress4
parameter.label: Channel CH33 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 4 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by Sensor or Thermostat.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for the temperature sensor (in seconds), default 300. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: CH33
parameter.label: CH33 Name
parameter.description: The name of CH33 (temperature sensor channel).

parameter.name: address
parameter.label: Address
parameter.description: The velbus address of the device. In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A0..A7 or Channel CH1..CH8.

parameter.name: subaddress1
parameter.label: Channel CH9..CH16 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 1 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A8..A15 or Channel CH9..CH16.

parameter.name: subaddress2
parameter.label: Channel CH17..CH24 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 2 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A16..A23 or Channel CH17..CH24.

parameter.name: subaddress3
parameter.label: Channel CH25..CH32 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 3 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A24..A31 or Channel CH25..CH32.

parameter.name: subaddress4
parameter.label: Channel CH33..CH40 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 4 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A32..A39 or Channel CH33..CH40.

parameter.name: subaddress5
parameter.label: Channel CH41..CH48 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 5 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A40..A47 or Channel CH41..CH48.

parameter.name: subaddress6
parameter.label: Channel CH49..CH56 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 6 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A48..A55 or Channel CH49..CH56.

parameter.name: subaddress7
parameter.label: Channel CH57..CH64 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 7 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Address A56..A63 or Channel CH57..CH64.

parameter.name: subaddress8
parameter.label: Channel CH65..CH72 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 8 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Group G0..G7 or Channel CH65..CH72.

parameter.name: subaddress9
parameter.label: Channel CH73..CH80 Address
parameter.description: The velbus sub-address 9 of the device (FF = disabled). In the VelbusLink application it's identified by DALI Group G8..G15 or Channel CH73..CH80.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh Interval
parameter.description: Refresh interval for the temperature sensor (in seconds), default 300. If set to 0 or left empty, no refresh will be scheduled.

parameter.name: VL1
parameter.label: Virtual Light 1
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH1,CH2,CH3,CH4)

parameter.name: VL2
parameter.label: Virtual Light 2
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH5,CH6,CH7,CH8)

parameter.name: VL3
parameter.label: Virtual Light 3
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH9,CH10,CH11,CH12)

parameter.name: VL4
parameter.label: Virtual Light 4
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH13,CH14,CH15,CH16)

parameter.name: VL5
parameter.label: Virtual Light 5
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH17,CH18,CH19,CH20)

parameter.name: VL6

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH21,CH22,CH23,CH24)

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH25,CH26,CH27,CH28)

parameter.name: VL9

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH33,CH34,CH35,CH36)

parameter.name: VL10

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH37,CH38,CH39,CH40)

parameter.name: VL11

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH41,CH42,CH43,CH44)

parameter.name: VL12

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH45,CH46,CH47,CH48)

parameter.name: VL13
parameter.label: Virtual Light 13
parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH49,CH50,CH51,CH52)

parameter.name: VL14

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH53,CH54,CH55,CH56)

parameter.description: Create a virtual color light from 3 or 4 channels. Format: Red_channel,Green_channel,Blue_channel,White_channel. White_channel is optionnal. From CH1 to CH64. (e.g. CH57,CH58,CH59,CH60)
